title: Representation on multistate commission
context: [ยง255-2 Representation on multistate commission.] The director of taxation, or the director&rsquo;s designee, shall represent the State on the Multistate Tax Commission. The attorney general, or the attorney general&rsquo;s designee, shall act as an alternate for the director of taxation. [L 1968, c 30, ยง3; gen ch 1993]
